name: Help Scout
natural_language_description: 这是 Help Scout 节点。主要用于: Consume Help Scout API

resource.name: resource
resource.natural_language_description: 参数名: Resource | 默认值: conversation

operation.name: operation
operation.natural_language_description: 参数名: Operation | 默认值: create
available_options: Create (值: create) - Create a new chat thread
Get Many (值: getAll) - Get many chat threads

mailboxId.name: mailboxId
mailboxId.natural_language_description: 参数名: Mailbox ID | (必填项)

status.name: status
status.natural_language_description: 参数名: Status | 作用: Conversation status | (必填项)

subject.name: subject
subject.natural_language_description: 参数名: Subject | 作用: Conversation’s subject | (必填项)

resolveData.name: resolveData
resolveData.description: By default the response only contain the ID to resource. If this option gets activated, it will resolve the data automatically.
resolveData.natural_language_description: 参数名: Resolve Data | 作用: By default the response only contain the ID to resource. If this option gets activated, it will resolve the data automatically. | 默认值: True

additionalFields.name: additionalFields
additionalFields.natural_language_description: 参数名: Additional Fields | 默认值: {}
available_options: draft (值: None) - Whether a draft reply is created
imported (值: None) - Whether no outgoing emails or notifications will be generated

threadsUi.name: threadsUi
threadsUi.natural_language_description: 参数名: Threads | 默认值: {}

conversationId.name: conversationId
conversationId.natural_language_description: 参数名: Conversation ID | (必填项)

returnAll.name: returnAll
returnAll.description: Whether to return all results or only up to a given limit
returnAll.natural_language_description: 参数名: Return All | 作用: Whether to return all results or only up to a given limit | 默认值: False

limit.name: limit
limit.description: Max number of results to return
limit.natural_language_description: 参数名: Limit | 作用: Max number of results to return | 默认值: 50

options.name: options
options.natural_language_description: 参数名: Options | 默认值: {}
available_options: firstName (值: None) - Filters customers by first name
lastName (值: None) - Filters customers by last name
mailbox (值: None) - Filters customers from a specific mailbox
modifiedSince (值: None) - Returns only customers that were modified after this date
sortField (值: None) - Sorts the result by specified field

addressUi.name: addressUi
addressUi.natural_language_description: 参数名: Address | 默认值: {}

chatsUi.name: chatsUi
chatsUi.natural_language_description: 参数名: Chat Handles | 默认值: {}

emailsUi.name: emailsUi
emailsUi.natural_language_description: 参数名: Emails | 默认值: {}

phonesUi.name: phonesUi
phonesUi.natural_language_description: 参数名: Phones | 默认值: {}

socialProfilesUi.name: socialProfilesUi
socialProfilesUi.natural_language_description: 参数名: Social Profiles | 默认值: {}

websitesUi.name: websitesUi
websitesUi.natural_language_description: 参数名: Websites | 默认值: {}

updateFields.name: updateFields
updateFields.natural_language_description: 参数名: Update Fields | 默认值: {}
available_options: firstName (值: None) - First name of the customer. When defined it must be between 1 and 40 characters.
gender (值: None) - Gender of this customer
jobTitle (值: None) - Job title. Max length 60 characters.
lastName (值: None) - Last name of the customer
location (值: None) - Location of the customer
photoUrl (值: None) - URL of the customer’s photo

text.name: text
text.natural_language_description: 参数名: Text | 作用: The chat text | (必填项)

attachmentsUi.name: attachmentsUi
attachmentsUi.description: Array of supported attachments to add to the message
attachmentsUi.natural_language_description: 参数名: Attachments | 作用: Array of supported attachments to add to the message | 默认值: {}
